p: Antioxidants help to prevent several human diseases. Citrus seeds and peels have proved to be a good source of flavonoids such as eriocitrin, naringin, narirutin, and hesperidin, holding antioxidant properties. Peels are also a rich source of limonoids-nomilinic acid, nimolin, and limonin, which have been demonstrated to be effective antimicrobial, antiviral, and antibacterial compounds [ 13, 114].
